topics.title: Describe Your Sleep Routine
topics.prompt: Describe your typical sleep routine and how you feel when you wake up.
topics.hint: 說明你平常幾點睡覺，怎麼起床，以及起床時的感覺，3~5句。
topics.sample: I usually go to bed at 10 p.m. I wake up at 7 a.m. When I wake up, I feel refreshed and ready to start the day.

topics.title: Talk About Feeling Sleepy
topics.prompt: Talk about a time when you felt very sleepy but had to keep doing something.
topics.hint: 描述一次你很想睡覺但還是必須繼續做事情的經驗，3~5句。
topics.sample: Last week, I was very sleepy during class. I wanted to sleep, but I needed to finish my homework. It was hard, but I managed to stay awake.

topics.title: Explain How You Wake Up
topics.prompt: Explain how you wake yourself up in the morning.
topics.hint: 說明你早上怎麼讓自己醒來，可以提到做的動作或用的方法，3~5句。
topics.sample: I usually set an alarm. Then, I wash my face with cold water. This helps me feel more awake.

topics.title: Describe a Dream You Had
topics.prompt: Describe a dream you had recently and how it made you feel.
topics.hint: 分享你最近做過的一個夢，並描述夢帶給你的感受，3~5句。
topics.sample: I had a dream that I was flying in the sky. It was amazing and exciting. When I woke up, I felt happy.

topics.title: Talk About When You Feel Tired
topics.prompt: Talk about situations when you often feel tired during the day.
topics.hint: 說明你平常什麼時候覺得累，可以描述原因和感受，3~5句。
topics.sample: I feel tired in the afternoon after lunch. Sometimes, I also feel tired when I study for a long time without a break.

topics.title: Share Your Favorite Rest Activity
topics.prompt: Share what you like to do when you want to rest and relax.
topics.hint: 描述你喜歡怎麼放鬆和休息，說明活動內容，3~5句。
topics.sample: When I want to rest, I like to listen to music or read a book. These activities help me feel calm and happy.

topics.title: Describe How Animals Sleep
topics.prompt: Describe how a certain animal sleeps or rests, based on what you know.
topics.hint: 選一種動物，說明它們怎麼睡覺或休息，3~5句。
topics.sample: Bears usually sleep a lot during the winter. They rest in a den and sleep deeply to save energy.

topics.title: Explain How You Feel After a Good Sleep
topics.prompt: Explain how you feel after having a good night's sleep.
topics.hint: 描述你睡飽後的感覺，可以提到精神、情緒等方面，3~5句。
topics.sample: After a good sleep, I feel energetic and happy. My mind is clear, and I can concentrate better in school.

topics.title: Talk About Morning Washing Habits
topics.prompt: Talk about what you do to wash your face or freshen up in the morning.
topics.hint: 分享你早上洗臉或讓自己精神的方法，3~5句。
topics.sample: In the morning, I wash my face with cold water. This wakes me up and makes me feel fresh.

topics.title: Imagine a Story Extension
topics.prompt: Imagine what the bear does after it wakes up. Tell a short story.
topics.hint: 發揮想像力，描述熊醒來後的活動，可以是一天的冒險或休息，3~5句。
topics.sample: After the bear wakes up, it stretches and goes outside to find some honey. Then, it rests under a tree and enjoys the sunshine.
